snippet: Next year, state lawmakers will try to sell voters on $1 billion in financing for highways, but voters tend to consider the costs of fixing even pressing problems.
lead_paragraph: Next year, state lawmakers will try to sell voters on $1 billion in financing for highways, but voters tend to consider the costs of fixing even pressing problems.

headline.main: Facing Limits on Financing Road Repairs
headline.print_headline: Facing Limits On Financing Road Repairs
